GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.18.15
GSD.description:
amt: use READ_ONCE() in amt module

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit 35481321a9a0f84f0ed335326214c77ba880c615, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit cbc21dc1cfe949e37b2a54c71511579f1899e8d4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: amt: use READ_ONCE() in amt module
